status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Since its a NPE in Java itself. And I am using latest Java 8 update 40, I wonder if we can detect we run on windows and then avoid that set permission call somehow? But maybe its just for testing hdfs running on windows itself. A production system surely woudlnt use windows for hdfs.
By looking at hadoop code (quickly in 2.6.0 version), I see hadoop uses something called winutils.exe expected to be present somewhere in HADOOP_HOME. it uses it to pass chmod invocation.
Currently configured pom to skip testing on windows
